fields.name: EnableSubPath
fields.description: If set to true, it will create and mount a dedicated directory for every individual app instance.

fields.name: MountOptions
fields.description: These are the mount options for a persistent disk.

fields.name: MountPath
fields.description: The mount path of the persistent disk.

fields.name: ReadOnly
fields.description: Indicates whether the persistent disk is a readOnly one.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The type of the underlying resource to mount as a persistent disk.
